lead_paragraph: Lawyers for a Texas teenager who used a so-called “affluenza” defense in a fatal drunken-driving case have told the Mexican authorities that they want to drop their fight against his deportation to the U.S.
snippet: Lawyers for a Texas teenager who used a so-called “affluenza” defense in a fatal drunken-driving case have told the Mexican authorities that they want to drop their fight against his deportation to the U.S.

headline.main: Texas: ‘Affluenza’ Teen Moves to Return to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Texas: ‘Affluenza’ Teenager Moves to Return to U.S.

abstract: Lawyers for Texas teen Ethan Couch, who used 'affluenza' in defense for fatal drunk-driving accident, drop fight against his deportation to US after he and mother Tonya Couch were found and arrested in Mexico.
